answerText: Reverend Mr. Hooper (prompt on "the minister")[10] In this story, Aylmer brews a potion that will remove the title hand-shaped blemish from Georgiana's face, but once the blemish is removed, she perishes.
heading: SUBMIT |2014 | WUSTL, Haverford, Bellarmine A | 4 | Literature | American | College
subject: Literature
question: Question:  [10] This character breaks off his engagement to Elizabeth after he begins to wear a garment that leaves only his mouth and chin visible and hung between "him and the world."
